author: Beniaminek
title: Classic water scooter
review: Currently, Lego blocks annoy me ready prefabricated blocks for various types of chassis. It's not here. In addition, a cool solution to design a sea buoy.

author: Odeinoichus
title: More Water Racers is always Welcome in LEGO City.
review:
Set #30363 Race Boat: This fun LEGO City Polybag is one I seem to have missed during my long review typing phase, it’s a great looking Polybag from 2019 originally and one that I completely forgot to discuss. Gee, sounds like I’m repeating myself again, if you can find it I’d say you can’t go wrong picking it up and here are the reasons why.

Pros:

  • Fun little model to build with an awesome design.
  • Decent Minifigure included for a female racer.
  • Easy to find originally at retail in many locations.

Cons:

  • Price-Per-Piece ratio a bit problematic with only 34 pieces.
  • No alternate hair element for the female racer.

Overall opinion

As I noted this was a really great looking polybag and included some extra side-models to act as markers for the race. Get a bunch of them and you can have a full racing team. Unfortunately you’d need to get some spare Minifigure elements to make them all unique. Recommended.
